name: 911 Emergency Response Sim 3D
description:
It requires lot of abilities, alertness & courage to rescue a one.

911 Emergency Response Sim 2018 is a simulation game which has multiple rescue missions in state of emergency. Become first emergency responder to reach injured & needy people and save them. Reach to evil ones & arrest them, rescue injured & perform CPR, save people from fire by playing role as firefighter. This game requires different roles as policeman, firefighter & ambulance man. Be ready to play multiple roles to safe lives of your people.

Drive FAST, yet SAFELY, and use your alert eye to deliver aid. Time based missions going to add fun & thrill in this game. The challenging missions are based on ambulance driving, fire extinguishing and police man roles where you have to reach on location within given time. Get to checkpoints on time to progress to next levels. This games requires your sacrifices for others & be a brave solider.

Play the role of firefighter, police officer & paramedic all at one!

911 Emergency Response Sim 2018 Features:
• Various thrilling Adrenalin filled rescue missions
• High quality 3D graphics & city environment
• Realistic physics based easy controls
• Experience the multiple roles all in one
• Engaging background music
• Fun & easy to play
